definitions.body: father of an officer of Sol. [[עִדּׂא]] 1Ki 4:14; LXX Axel, A Sadwk, LXXL Axiab
grandfather of prophet Zechariah [[עִדּוֹ]] Zec 1:1, [[עִדּוֹא]] v:Zec 1:7; LXX Addw.
a Levite [[עִדּוֹ]] 1Ch 6:6; LXX Adei, LXXL Addw.
a priestly name [[עִדוֹא]] van d. H. Ginsb (Baer [[עִדּוֹ]]) Ne 12:4; LXX [[א]] etc. Adaiav; also [[עדיא]] v:Ne 12:16 Kt ([[עֲדָיׇא]]?), Qr [[עִדּוֹא]]; LXX [[א]] tw|= Addai, LXXL tw| Adaia.
a seer [[עִדּוֹ הַחׂזֶה]] 2Ch 12:15 = [[הַנׇּכִיא עִדּוֹ]] 2Ch 13:22, LXX Ad(d)w; = [[יֶעְדּוֹ]] 2Ch 9:29, Iwhl(d).
